title: Available 1 Bed 1 Bath
posting_body: This apartment features a living room, dining room, and kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher.
There is wood-style flooring throughout the majority of the space with carpeting in the bedroom(s).
This unit also features window coverings, energy efficient lighting, spacious closets, select units with fireplace, central heat and air conditioning, and an in home washer and dryer.
Community amenities include a swimming pool, sundeck, outdoor grilling and picnic area, fitness center, controlled access entry and onsite maintenance and management.
Off-street parking included and garage parking available.
This apartment is a fourteen minute drive to I-35.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
